scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development && npm run build2:ts && node scripts/startup.js && npm run build3:ts && node scripts/entrypoint.js & next dev
scripts.build: npm ci && npm run build2:ts && node scripts/startup.js && npm run build3:ts && next build
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production && npm run start2
scripts.test: npm run cypress & npm run start:test
scripts.start:test: export NODE_ENV=test APP_ENV=test && npm run clean && npm run start2
scripts.start2: npm run build2:ts && node scripts/startup.js && npm run build3:ts && node scripts/entrypoint.js & next build && next start
scripts.clean: rm -f tsconfig2.tsbuildinfo; rm -f tsconfig3.tsbuildinfo; rm -f test.db; rm -rf ./scripts/data
